### Professional Experience

**Postdoctoral Researcher** | January 2025-Present
Urban Forest Institute, 1352 Pacific St, San Luis Obispo CA

Duties: Conduct research on issues relating to urban forestry in California. Prepare academic and professional publications and presentations.

**Botanist (GS7)** | April-September 2018
US Forest Service, 631 Coyote St, Nevada City CA

Duties: Conduct floristic surveys on US Forest Service lands in Nevada county CA. Identify and map rare plants using Arc Collector. Document rare plant populations for NEPA analysis.

**Vegetation Crew Lead** | April-August 2017
Eastern Nevada Landscape Coalition, 1500 F. Ave Ely NV

Duties: Lead a crew of two in post fire vegetation surveys. Protocols involved plant ID and soil classification.

**Student Assistant** | May 2014 – March 2017
UCSC Arboretum, 1156 High St. Santa Cruz CA

Duties: Maintenance of maritime chaparral garden, seed and cutting propagation, supervising interns and student workers, collecting seeds and cuttings in the field, cleaning and banking seeds, outplanting, and invasive weed control.

**Botanist (GS5)** | May-September 2015
US Forest Service, 631 Coyote St, Nevada City CA

Duties: Conduct floristic surveys on US Forest Service lands in Plumas county CA. Identify and map rare plants using Trimble GPS. Assist with GIS and data management.
